description: Trade Agreement: CETA/WTO-AGP/CPTPP/FTAs with Peru/Colombia/Panama/Korea/UK, Tendering Procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid, Competitive Procurement Strategy: Not Applicable - Pre-Qualification and Letter of Interest only. Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement: None, Nature of Requirements. This is an unsolicited tender for Tactical power systems which can provide the Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
## Solicitation Notification: Tactical Power Systems (TPS)

### General Information

* Solicitation number: W8476-206276/D
* Posting date: April 17, 2023
* Closing date: December 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* Amended solicitation: Yes

### Background and Objectives

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking industry feedback and interest in the Department of National Defence's Tactical Power Systems (TPS) project. The objective of this request for information (RFI) is to engage industry in a consultation process to assess its capabilities to supply and deliver the project's requirements.

### Solicitation Description

The TPS project aims to provide operationally reliable and safe electric power systems for the Canadian Armed Forces. The system will be used for Headquarters, Communications, Logistics, and other tactical troop concentrations during national emergencies, training, and operations overseas.

Industry is invited to provide feedback on the preliminary requirements and estimated cost estimates for the project. The government is seeking information on industry's capabilities to meet the project's requirements, including licensing, intellectual property rights, and other factors that may impact its ability to bid on the project.

### Instructions for Respondents

Respondents are required to provide answers and feedback related to the attached draft documents, with a priority given to estimated cost estimates. The estimated costing is required to prepare the final Project Approval documents.

### Additional Amendments

Further amendments to this RFI may be conducted to:

* Provide industry with updated Statement of Requirements and sustainment requirements
* Refine the requirements and further develop the procurement and sustainment strategies
* Gather industry knowledge, expertise, and recommendations on best practices to increase the success of a solicitation
* Obtain industry feedback on any issues that would impact its ability to bid on the project

### Contact Information

* Contact name: Paul Lacoursiere
* Contact email: [Paul.Lacoursiere@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Paul.Lacoursiere@pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Contact phone: (343) 551-1529
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Documents

Attachéments:

* [ABES.PROD.PW__QF.B125.E29040.EBSU000.PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/
